response.summary:
I am a curious person with a great sense of responsibility and autonomy, which have allowed me to quickly acquire knowledge, adding my personal skills that have allowed me to lead and transmit this knowledge to my work groups.

In professional development, I highlight my experience at Siemens S.A and TurboNDE, where I put my knowledge and skills into practice in areas of personal interest and of transcendental importance in the company, such as industrial automation and robotic product development, taking as a reference industry 4.0.

Currently the focus of my master's degree is on the generative development of new mechatronic products and how to develop it in different types of plants, with different levels of automation.
response.skills: Manufactura, SQL, C++, CUDA, Angular, TypeScript, Robótica, modelado cad, Control de procesos, Automatización industrial, Matlab, Python

profile_positions.description:
Analysis of information in the dean's office of the Faculty of Engineering of different information systems, to analyze enrollment behavior and development of subjects in the Faculty. 
Development of different web tools to automate processes in the faculty due to the health contingency of Covid 19. 
Support in the deployment and maintenance on the server of the tools developed to manage different databases.
profile_positions.title: Data analyst

profile_positions.description:
Development of implementations in MES software of applications in the stage of design, manufacture and use of products.
The implementation involves:
* Massive deployment of low cost servers (Raspberry Pi).
* Integration with ROS and Firebase databases
* Deployment of packages for machine vision processing
* Development of libraries in CUDA to apply multi-objective optimization
* Development of parametric and generative design of components.
profile_positions.title: Research Project

profile_positions.description: With focus in Industrie 4.0, I'm developing a MES system for Switchboard Factory in Siemens S.A for improve and reduce fabrication time. This MES system connect inputs like SAP (ERP system), eBase (engineering area) and more outputs in administrative areas (Excel , SharePoint, etc.). With this system tasks how tracing raw material from the warehouse to productions lines, productions time controller and productions planning have improved productivity and generate savings of more that 100 million COP per year.
profile_positions.title: Technical Engineering

profile_positions.description: In TurboNde I developed a mechanical robotic system for supervision in gas turbines, generators and jet engines. That's design is patent pending and has the abilitie to change monitoring tool.
profile_positions.title: Junior Design Engineer

profile_positions.description: Bajo el paradigma de la industria 4.0, y gracias al financiamiento de Colciencias, se desarrolló un brazo robótico de 4gdl y de bajo costo. El objetivo del proyecto fue realizar actividades de supervisión remota en la celda de manufactura experimental del laboratorio.
profile_positions.title: Laboratorio de Fabricación Experimental LabFabEx

profile_positions.description: Se llevó a cabo la creación del semillero con la visión de trabajar en zonas petroleras de fuera del alcance de los buzos. Se desarrolla un simulador para entrenar pilotos en la operación de robots subacuáticos, que permitió la divulgación del semillero en Bogotá Robótica y en la universidad.
profile_positions.title: Semillero de Investigación de Robots Subacuáticos SIRSUN

profile_positions.description: Organizó el concurso de robótica móvil Insignia de la Universidad que continúa realizándose anualmente con inversion de empresas lideres en automatización como Colsein.
profile_positions.title: CEIMTUN - Organizador Concurso Robotica Movil
